name: Jordan Bortner
bio: I am a full-stack software engineer and web developer with a lifelong passion for programming, music, and language. I love solving problems with code, and collaborating with others. My specialties include JavaScript technologies (Node.js, React.js, Express.js, Mongoose.js), HTML, CSS, and JavaScript/XML (JSX). I am an obsessive organizer, have strong communication skills, and am very detail-oriented.
